name: Blogger To WordPress Importer & Import Blogger Post Without Loosing SEO
author: Ajay Malik

sections.description:
Do you want to switch from Blogger to WordPress without losing any of your content, images, or SEO settings? If yes, then you need Blogger to WordPress Importer, the ultimate WordPress plugin for blog migration.

Blogger to WordPress Importer is a simple and powerful plugin that allows you to transfer all your data from Blogger to WordPress in a matter of minutes. You don’t need any technical skills or coding knowledge to use this plugin. Just paste your blog URL and let the plugin do the rest.

With Blogger to WordPress Importer, you can:

*Import unlimited pages and posts from Blogger to WordPress
*Keep all your labels and categories intact
*Move all your images and media files with ease
*Automatically set images and features for each post
*Preserve your SEO-friendly URLs and rankings
*Create 301 redirects from old pages to new pages
*Blogger to WordPress Importer is the best solution for blog migration. It is fast, reliable, and secure. It works with any WordPress theme and version. It also supports multiple languages and RTL.

Don’t wait any longer. Get Blogger to WordPress Importer today and enjoy the benefits of WordPress. Download it now and get a 30-day money-back guarantee.

switch from Blogger to WordPress
transfer data from Blogger to WordPress
import pages and posts from Blogger to WordPress
move images and media files from Blogger to WordPress
create 301 redirects from Blogger to WordPress

If you’ve any Query Please contact me on Twitter @ajaymalikpro

2

*You no more need api to import blogger posts/pages
*NEW UI
*Improved user experience
sections.faq:
How many Posts can it import?

It can import unlimited number of posts and pages.

Does it impact my SEO?

No, Our plugin Map blogger to wordpress 1-to-1
